channel.title: Docker on Vineeth Pothulapati
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Vineeth Pothulapati

item.title: Talks
item.description: Securing Container Workloads at K8s Forum Delhi 2020 Security in the world of containers has become complex as we use different base images. We cannot be aware of what our containers are made up of and cope up with dependencies and transitive dependencies and their updates. On average at least 30 vulnerabilities exist in the top 10 docker images. Do you know if youâ€™re using any of these? If your application containers are based on vulnerable images, your deployment could be open to attack.
